EDUCATION

INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY  /  10/2012 - 05/2017
Major: International Business Administration( full English studied)
Bachelor degree
WORKING EXPERIENCE
THIEN QUAN , LTD  /  07/2016 - 04/2018
Sales and Purchasing Staff
Thien Quan, LTD is a printing company which has more than 15
years experience on variety printing and company gifts.
  -Finding potential customers, agencies.
 - Analyzing their requirements and make quotation
- In charge of online purchasing from China and other
countries.
       *Finding new products that doesn't available in Viet Nam
market 
       * Dealing with suppliers to get the best price.
- Reporting to the manager weekly.
- Analyzing sales data collected weekly/monthly. (B2C)
CATHAY PACIFIC CARGO  /  04/2017 - 04/2018
Acceptance Staff
Established in 1946, Cathay Pacific Cargo freighters currently
fly to 46 destinations around the world.  
-Checked the VCT (Vehicle Control Ticket) from the freight
forwarder company.
-Identified "Dangerous Goods" and "Vulnerable Goods".
-Matched up with the AWB (Air Way Bill).
-Tallied the cartons and scaling the total weight.
 Inputed data to handheld and moving the freight to the
internal zone (EXM) for building up.
ROBAM VIETNAM  /  05/2018 - 07/2019
Business Development Executive - B2B
Robam is a kitchen appliances company which has more than
30 year on the market. Factory base in Hangzhou, China.
-Found and contacted the purchaser of apartment construction
company, wholesalers, and kitchen accessories store.
- Followed up after quoted price negotiated discount for
wholesale purchasing.
- Planed the marketing strategies to reach potential customers
through Online and Offline methods.
- Made time-table for Sales Team
- Processed critical data points to serve for sales and customer
service
- Ensured the smooth operation of sales (B2B)
ACHIEVEMENTS
Cargo Services certifications with score 9.5/10
issued by Saigon Cargo Services Corporation.
(2017)
- Training Course : Sales, Manager skills in
China (2018)
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
